surrounding_lines:
Categories
  • Cras justo odio

Categories
  • Cras justo odio

statements.sql: select * from `categories` where exists (select 1 from `category_hierarchy` where categories.id = category_hierarchy.category_id and `category_hierarchy`.`category_parent_id` = '0') and `type` = 'Product'

params.hints: Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table

statements.sql: select `categories`.*, `category_hierarchy`.`category_parent_id` as `pivot_category_parent_id`, `category_hierarchy`.`category_id` as `pivot_category_id` from `categories` inner join `category_hierarchy` on `categories`.`id` = `category_hierarchy`.`category_id` where `category_hierarchy`.`category_parent_id` in ('1')

params.hints: Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table

statements.sql: select `categories`.*, `category_hierarchy`.`category_parent_id` as `pivot_category_parent_id`, `category_hierarchy`.`category_id` as `pivot_category_id` from `categories` inner join `category_hierarchy` on `categories`.`id` = `category_hierarchy`.`category_id` where `category_hierarchy`.`category_parent_id` in ('2', '3')

params.hints: Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
